page.title: 17INDUSTRY IN WOOKEY HOLE AREA
page.content: FARMING AND TOURISM ARE THE MOST IMPORTANT INDUSTRIES OF THE WOOKEY HOLE AREA, BUT TECHNOLOGY AND ART HAVE RECENTLY BEEN INTRODUCED. MOST OF THE FARMING IS MIXED OR DAIRY FARMING;THE NUMBER OF COWS TENDING TO DECREASE AS PASTURE IS USED HIGHER UP THE SLOPES OF THE MENDIP HILLS. CATERING FOR THE NEEDS OF TOURISTS OR CAMPERS IS A PRIORITY, AND ALL THE ATTRACTIONS OF THE CAVES,NOW RUN BY MADAME TUSSAUD'S,ARE OFFERED FOR THE ADMISSION CHARGE. A LARGE AREA OF THE CAVES'MAIN CAR PARK IS NOW PERMANENTLY OCCUPIED BY EMPLOYEES OF THORN E.M.I. HOUSED IN PART OF THE OLD PAPER MILL. THE FORMER METHODIST CHAPEL IN WOOKEY HOLE IS NOW A STUDIO WHERE SCULTURES OF NATURAL HISTORY, USING MODERN AND TRADITIONAL MATERIALS, ARE MADE.
